title: Not My Job: Drummer Marky Ramone Gets Quizzed On Marky Mark
teaser: Marky Ramone, who has written a memoir called Punk Rock Blitzkrieg, will see if he can correctly answer three questions about Marky Mark and the Funky Bunch. Originally broadcast on Feb. 28, 2015.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
